title: Dhikr After Witr
description: Authentic supplications for Dhikr After Witr
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Dhikr After Witr. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 119
items.arabic: ((سُبْحَانَ المَلِكِ القُدُّوسِ)) ثلاثَ مرَّاتٍ والثَّالِثَةُ يَجْهَرُ بها ويَمُدُّ بها صَوتَهُ يقولُ: [رَبِّ الْمَلاَئِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ])).
